name: Relativity (itch) (bsvercl)
description:
Shoot through waves of enemies and use the power of time to take back space.

Keyboard controls

Left/right - move

Up - Rewind

Z - Shoot

X - Missile

Gamepad (Xbox) controls

D-Pad left/right - move

X - Rewind

A - Shoot

B - Missile

How to play

Avoid enemy bullets, collect power ups.

Watch your rewind indicator in the top left!

Some enemies take more bullets to explode.

Rewind takes a snapshot roughly every 10 seconds; unlimited use.

Powerups

Palette used: https://lospec.com/palette-list/endesga-8
